description: This file is a JavaScript module that provides a public interface for parsing embedded transcript attachments related to Statements of Work (SOW). It defines an async function `parseBuiltinTemplates` which loads specific template files, parses their content to extract structured sections and schemas, and returns an array of template metadata objects.

methods.name: parseBuiltinTemplates()
methods.description: Async function that loads predefined template files, parses their contents, and returns an array of parsed template objects including id, title, sections, schema, and metadata.
